wordGroup: attrition rate 损耗率；退学率

sentences.en: It was a war of attrition.
The rebels have declared a cease-fire in their war of attrition against the government.
sentences.cn: 在与政府的消耗战中，叛军已宣布停火。

sentences.en: The long war of attrition exhausted the strength of both countries.
sentences.cn: 这场长期的消耗战耗尽了两国的力量。
